Package ChatServer

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatServer.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Primary server class. Waits for message from a client then creates a new thread to handle client requests
    Author:
    Jonathan Robinson
